LanguageData.VFEV-Freya.label: Freya Fierce
LanguageData.VFEV-Freya.description: Freya believes in the importance of showing your strength and using force to show others their place. Every year after the first year, at the start of Aprimay your settlement will become increasingly unhappy until you send your colonists on an adventure or a raid, and bring back the spoils of war.
